name: Bingo (itch)
description:
This is a variation of the classic card based Bingo. Select from 3 up to 8 numbers from 80 total that you think are the winning ones. Start the lottery and 20 numbers will be drawn in random from the lottery machine.

If you reach a certain number of hits, you are allowed to draw 2 extra balls to increase your winnings. Beware..... the extra balls are not free, you pay the same bet as it was during the game.


If you don't want to select or cannot decide for the numbers the game offers several pre-defined cards.
